body_content.explanation: the act of adding textures (= patterns or images that can be added to the surface of 3-D objects) to computer graphics (= images produced on computer) or film:
examples: The software is used for 3-D modelling and texturing.
I'd already done some texturing in film.

body_content.explanation: (of computer graphics or film) the quality of having had textures (= patterns or images that can be added to the surface of 3-D objects) added:
examples: The artwork and texturing on the game is beautiful.
The model and texturing used in the two figures is the same – they just have a different lighting scheme.
